thread.title: Health Content Site - 15 Million Yearly Visitors
thread.title_full: Health Content Site - 15 Million Yearly Visitors

title: Health Content Site - 15 Million Yearly Visitors
text: Questions Business Summary For sale is a two year old site that had 1.4 million visitors in February 2015 over 15 million visitors in the last year. This site belongs in the same category of ''viral content media'' like Upworthy and Buzzfeed. The focus is natural health and their fans are people interested in how to prevent diseases and live longer through eating well, living well and being happy. The natural health market is huge and includes a wide spectrum of people interested in natural cures, non-GMO, organic, raw superfoods, meditation, yoga etc. Each day, the site curates and publishes popular and trending health content for their audience. Through any one piece of viral content the site gets anywhere from 10K visitors per day to 100k visitors per day. The main revenue sources are advertising and affiliate commissions. Marketing and traffic generation is done through content discovery and Facebook. Highlights: o Growing search engine traffic o Can be used to create a custom audience in Facebook o 135K fan page on Facebook o Scalable revenue growth potential o Relatively low overhead and maintenance o No need to deal with clients o Relationships with the highest paying premium ad networks o 80,000+ targeted email subscriber list o Building an asset and brand name that grows exponentially in value. Financials
